title: Is the United States in a fiscal talespin | Number Theory
description: Days after Moody’s downgraded its credit rating for US from AAA to AA1, the International Monetary Fund (IMF) has flagged what it sees as the “ever increasing” debt burden of the world’s largest economy. “The US fiscal deficits are too large and they need to be brought down,” Gita Gopinath, IMF’s fi...
